testcase.name: Login with different users
testcase.system-out: Given I am able to navigate on to login page................................passed When I update the username as "Admin".......................................passed And I update the password as "admin123".....................................passed And I click on the login button.............................................passed Then I should see username as "Welcome Paul"................................passed

testcase.name: Negative Login
testcase.system-out: Given I am able to navigate on to login page................................passed When I update the username as "linda.anderson"..............................passed And I update the password as "linda.anderson"...............................passed And I click on the login button.............................................passed Then I should see error message as "Invalid credentials"....................passed
